Dostupny v internetu: {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}. === Stil Bluebook === {{FULLPAGENAME}}, {{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}} (poslědnje posěčenje {{CURRENTMONTHNAME}} {{CURRENTDAY}}, {{CURRENTYEAR}}). === Dane BibTeX === @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}", note = "[Onlajn; posěčeny {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" } Ako upotrěbjajete [[LaTeX]]-paket url (\usepackage{url} někde v preambulě), ktory često davaje lěpje formatovane veb-adresy, vy možete koristati slědujuči tekst: @misc{ wiki:xxx, author = "{{SITENAME}}", title = "{{FULLPAGENAME}} --- {{SITENAME}}{,} {{int:sitesubtitle}}", year = "{{CURRENTYEAR}}", url = "'''\url{'''{{canonicalurl:{{FULLPAGENAME}}|oldid={{REVISIONID}}}}'''}'''", note = "[Onlajn; posěčeny {{CURRENTDAY}}-{{CURRENTMONTHNAME}}-{{CURRENTYEAR}}]" }
